description: Much like the precision, focus and dedication of the precarious tightrope walkers who balance high above ground, our Highline sock balances vintage looks, traditional midweight cushioning and moisture-wicking power of Merino Wool. This is a classic men's hiking sock in our signature Micro Crew height and ribbed leg that will not slip. You'll feel like a pro, so go ahead, you won't feel woozy when you look down.
name: Darn Tough Socks Highline Micro Crew Midweight Cushion Socks - Mens
